abstract: Pres Obama plans to announce executive order that will cease government threats of criminal prosecution against families of American hostages, held by groups like Islamic State, if they attempt to pay ransom for release of their relatives.
lead_paragraph: Families of captives that try to raise ransom money for groups like the Islamic State will no longer face the threat of prosecution, officials say.

headline.main: Obama Ordering Changes in U.S. Hostage Policies
headline.print_headline: Obama to Change Policies on American Hostages
